name: Israel Katz
title: Israeli Minister of Energy (now Minister of Foreign Affairs)

quotes.quote: All the civilian population in Gaza is ordered to leave immediately. We will win. They will not receive a drop of water or a single battery until they leave the world
quotes.context: Threat to deny basic necessities to entire civilian population

sources.name: The Guardian - The brutality and inhumanity of Israel's assault on Gaza is no surprise. It's just what was promised
